summary: In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.
cast: Natalie Press|Emily Blunt|Paddy Considine|Dean Andrews|Michelle Byrne|Paul Antony-Barber|Lynette Edwards|Kathryn Sumner
title: My Summer of Love
